constructor.details: Constructor sets the deployer as admin

createETHPiggyBank(uint256).details: Create a new ETH piggy bank

returns.piggyBank: Address of the created piggy bank

createTokenPiggyBank(address,uint256).details: Create a new ERC20 token piggy bank

returns.piggyBank: Address of the created piggy bank

returns.totalBanks: Total number of piggy banks created

getPenaltyTokenBalance(address).details: Get penalty balance for a specific token

getUserPiggyBankDetails(address).details: Get detailed information about all user's piggy banks

returns.isLocked: Array indicating if each bank is still locked
returns.tokens: Array of token addresses (address(0) for ETH)

getUserPiggyBanks(address).details: Get all piggy banks created by a user

getUserTotalETHBalance(address).details: Get total balance across all user's piggy banks (ETH only)

returns.totalBalance: Total ETH balance across all user's piggy banks

getUserTotalTokenBalance(address,address.details: Get total balance across all user's piggy banks for a specific token

returns.totalBalance: Total token balance across all user's piggy banks

withdrawPenaltyETH(uint256).details: Admin function to withdraw collected penalty fees (ETH)

withdrawPenaltyToken(address,uint256).details: Admin function to withdraw collected penalty fees (ERC20 tokens)
